_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Sonarqube app
author: contact@funixgaming.fr

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# SonarQube Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

echo -e "installing dependencies"
apt-get -y update
apt-get install -y wget unzip

## add user
echo -e "adding container user"
useradd -d /home/container -m container -s /bin/bash

## own server to container user
chown container: /mnt/server/

cd /mnt/server

wget https://binaries.sonarsource.com/Distribution/sonarqube/sonarqube-9.6.1.59531.zip && unzip sonarqube-*.zip
mv sonarqube-*/ sonarqube
rm sonarqube-*.zip
